00024 #include "FMath/FMArray.h"

00028 namespace fm
00029 {
00032     template <class T>
00033     class pvector : public fm::vector<const void*>
00034     {
00035     public:
00036         typedef typename fm::vector<const void*> Parent; 
00037         typedef T* item; 
00038         typedef const T* const_item; 
00039         typedef item* iterator; 
00040         typedef const_item* const_iterator; 
00043         pvector() : Parent() {}
00044 
00047         pvector(size_t size) : Parent(size) {}
00048 
00052         pvector(size_t size, const T& defaultValue) : Parent(size, defaultValue) {}
00053 
00056         pvector(const pvector<T>& copy) : Parent(copy) {}
00057 
00061         pvector(const T** values, size_t count) : Parent()
00062         {
00063             resize(count);
00064             memcpy(&front(), values, count * sizeof(void*));
00065         }
00066 
00068         virtual ~pvector()
00069         {
00070 #ifdef _DEBUG
00071             Parent::clear();
00072             Parent::push_back((void*) (size_t) 0xFFFFFFFF);
00073 #endif // _DEBUG
00074         }
00075 
00078         T*& front() { return (T*&) Parent::front(); }
00079         const T*& front() const { return (const T*&) Parent::front(); } 
00083         T*& back() { return (T*&) Parent::back(); }
00084         const T*& back() const { return (const T*&) Parent::back(); } 
00089         inline T*& at(size_t index) { return (T*&) Parent::at(index); }
00090         inline const T*& at(size_t index) const { return (const T*&) Parent::at(index); } 
00091         template <class INTEGER> inline T*& operator[](INTEGER index) { return (T*&) Parent::at(index); } 
00092         template <class INTEGER> inline const T*& operator[](INTEGER index) const { return (const T*&) Parent::at(index); } 
00096         inline iterator begin() { return (!empty()) ? &front() : NULL; }
00097         inline const_iterator begin() const { return (!empty()) ? &front() : NULL; } 
00101         inline iterator end() { return (!empty()) ? (&back()) + 1 : NULL; }
00102         inline const_iterator end() const { return (!empty()) ? (&back()) + 1 : NULL; } 
00108         inline iterator find(const T* item) { Parent::iterator f = Parent::find(item); return begin() + (f - Parent::begin()); }
00109         inline const_iterator find(const T* item) const { Parent::const_iterator f = Parent::find(item); return begin() + (f - Parent::begin()); }
00110 
00115         inline iterator insert(iterator _iterator, T* object)
00116         {
00117             iterator originalStart = begin();
00118             Parent::iterator newIt = Parent::insert(Parent::begin() + (_iterator - originalStart), object);
00119             return begin() + (newIt - Parent::begin());
00120         }
00121 
00125         inline void insert(iterator _iterator, size_t count)
00126         {
00127             Parent::iterator it = Parent::begin() + (_iterator - begin());
00128             Parent::insert(it, count, NULL);
00129         }
00130 
00136         template <class _It>
00137         inline void insert(iterator _where, _It _startIterator, _It _endIterator)
00138         {
00139             size_t relativeWhere = _where - begin();
00140             size_t count = _endIterator - _startIterator;
00141             Parent::insert(Parent::begin() + relativeWhere, count, (T*) 0);
00142             _where = begin() + relativeWhere;
00143 
00144             memcpy(_where, _startIterator, sizeof(void*) * count);
00145         }
00146         
00149         inline iterator erase(iterator _it)
00150         {
00151             Parent::iterator it = Parent::begin() + (_it - begin());
00152             it = Parent::erase(it);
00153             return begin() + (it - Parent::begin());
00154         }
00155 
00159         inline bool erase(const T* value)
00160         {
00161             Parent::iterator it = Parent::find(value);
00162             if (it != Parent::end()) { Parent::erase(it); return true; }
00163             return false;
00164         }
00165 
00169         inline void erase(iterator first, iterator last)
00170         {
00171             Parent::erase(Parent::begin() + (first - begin()), Parent::begin() + (last - begin()));
00172         }
00173 
00176         inline void erase(size_t index) { Parent::erase(Parent::begin() + index); }
00177 
00182         inline bool release(const T* value)
00183         {
00184             Parent::iterator it = Parent::find(value);
00185             if (it != Parent::end()) { Parent::erase(it); delete value; return true; }
00186             return false;
00187         }
00188 
00193         pvector<T>& operator= (const pvector<T>& other) { clear(); insert(end(), other.begin(), other.end()); return *this; }
00194 
00198         void resize(size_t count)
00199         {
00200             Parent::resize(count, NULL);
00201         }
00202     };
00203 };
